alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 01 at 1:49AM CDT until April 01 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Illinois, Randolph IL County. In Missouri, Crawford MO, Washington MO, Iron MO, Madison MO, Reynolds MO, Saint Francois MO, and Sainte Genevieve MO Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.
